

>>>>> INPUT >>>>>

Some **bold text** here. %This text is a comment.

And some *italic* text there.

Refer to @mySection.

An itemization:

* first item
* second item
    * first subitem
    * second subitem

{
  "type": "itemize",
  "items": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "value": "first item"
    },
    {

    }
  ]
}


>>>>> OUTPUT >>>>>

{
  "items": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "value": "Some"
    },
    {
      "type": "bold",
      "items": [
        {
          "type": "text",
          "value": "bold text"
        }
      ]
    }
    {
      "type": "text",
      "value": "here."
    },
    {
      "type": "linefeed"
    },
    {
      "type: "text",
      "value": "Refer to"
    },
    {
      "type": "reference",
      "value": "mySection"
    },
    {
      "type: "text",
      "value": "."
    }
  ]
}
